summary: Marius is faced with a choice whether to fulfill his passion by sailing the seas or stay and marry the woman he loves.
cast: Raimu|Pierre Fresnay|Fernand Charpin|Alida Rouffe|Paul Dullac|Alexandre Mihalesco|Robert Vattier|Édouard Delmont|Orane Demazis|Lucien Callamand|Zé Digiovanni|Giovanni|Milly Mathis|Marcel Maupi|Quéret|Valentine Ribe|Vassi
title: Marius
